segments.text: I notice the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me sick.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and it’s gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s just wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like she’s entitled to those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand how messy the kitchen is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the whole scene is just unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is ruining the floor, and no one cares.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to look away, but I can’t.
segments.speaker: PAR
